explanatory.question: Why does [person_1] practices?
answer: For the convenience of controlling her hair.

predictive.question: What will [person_1] do next after the full preparation?
answer: [person_1] will begin to work out as usual.
reason: This work must be a physically consuming work.
[person_1] looks very strong and goes to gym often.
The strenuous exercise is physically consuming.

counterfactual.question: What will happen if power is off?
answer: The competition would be called off.
reason: Otherwise the dancer will fall easily.
The room will become dark then.
The weight of weight lifting is too much for him.
